# Enemy

**Extends:** [Actor](../Actor) < [KinematicBody2D](../KinematicBody2D)

## Description

## Property Descriptions

### patrol\_path

```gdscript
export var patrol_path = ""
```

Pre-programmed path the enemy will patrol on

### patrol\_points

```gdscript
var patrol_points
```

Collection of points on the patrol path

### patrol\_index

```gdscript
var patrol_index
```

Current point to which the enemy is currently trying to move

## Method Descriptions

### follow\_path

```gdscript
func follow_path()
```

Makes the enemy sprite follow the desired path
